content.rendered:
Lacrosse Made Easy

Websites, Registration, Youth Lacrosse Management Tools, & More!

Get Started

Learn More

Trusted By

FEATURES

Registration & Payments

Customizable online registration gives you complete control over age and gender-specific program options, fees, and discounts.

Communication

Keep members up-to-date with instant texting, professionally designed and custom emails, and mobile app alerts.

SAFETY & COMPLIANCE

Prioritize player safety using integrations with several leading background check providers and safety education platforms including SafeSport.

Funding

Sports Connect delivers the fastest funds transfer in the industry so you have access to your funds in as little as 48 hours.

Scheduling

Take control of your game and practice schedules with custom or automated scheduling, easy distribution, and in-app reminders.

PROFESSIONAL WEBSITES

Upgrade your look with mobile-friendly, professional websites that are fully-integrated with your league management tools.

Get Started

BUILT FOR ANY DEVICE

OTHER SERVICES

GameChanger

Bring your schedule updates, roster management, customized team chats, and more all into the palm of your hand.

CaptainU

Help connect athletes with collegiate teams through online profiles, easy communication tools, and more.

Officials Connect

Simplify official management with online scheduling, assessment, and payments.

Stack Raise

Create a campaign for your school or team in minutes and securely raise money online.

GET IN TOUCH WITH OUR TEAM TODAY




